name: yeetfile
description: YeetFile is a self-hosted file sharing app for sending files quickly with expiring links and optional passwords. It focuses on simplicity and privacy while providing a straightforward browser interface.
features: Expiring links: Set automatic expiration times for shared files to ensure temporary access and reduce storage bloat.
Password protection: Secure file downloads with optional passwords to control who can access shared content.
Simple uploads: Drag and drop files into the browser or use the upload button for straightforward file sharing.
No registration required: Share files without forcing recipients to create accounts or sign in to download.
Privacy focused: Host files on your own infrastructure without relying on third-party services that track users.
Download limits: Restrict the number of times a file can be downloaded before the link becomes invalid.
File size limits: Configure maximum upload sizes to manage storage capacity and prevent abuse.
Clean URLs: Generate short, memorable links for shared files instead of long cryptic identifiers.
Upload history: View previously shared files with expiration status and download counts in a simple dashboard.
Automatic cleanup: Remove expired files automatically to free up storage space without manual intervention.
Minimal dependencies: Deploy quickly with a lightweight application that requires minimal server resources.
Open source: Audit the code, customize functionality, and contribute improvements to the project.
